prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Are we still on for lunch tomorrow?  

Just a reminder that your dentist appointment is at 3 PM on Thursday.  

Your package has been shipped and should arrive by Friday.  

Thanks for the great meeting today! Looking forward to our next steps.  

Can you send me the notes from yesterday’s call?  

Just checking in to see how you’re doing. Let me know if you want to talk!  

Your bank statement is ready to view online.  

I’m running a bit late; I’ll be there in 15 minutes.  

Don’t forget, the community cleanup event is this Saturday at 10 AM!  

Your OTP for login is 456789.  

Hi! It was great catching up last week. Let’s do it again soon!  

Your grocery order will be delivered between 5 and 7 PM.  

Congratulations! You've been selected for the next round of interviews.  

Just wanted to say I’m proud of you for finishing that project!  

Hi Mom, I’ll be home for dinner at 6. What should I bring?  

Your subscription will renew on March 5.  

I saw your post about the concert. Sounds like a blast!  

Please confirm your attendance at the team meeting on Monday.  

I hope you’re feeling better! Let me know if you need anything.  

Your flight has been confirmed for next week. Safe travels!  

I’ll pick up the kids from school today.  

There’s a new exhibit at the art gallery this weekend, want to go?  

Your password has been successfully changed.  

Just a heads up, the office will be closed Friday for the holiday.  

I’m here if you need to vent about anything.  

Your utility bill is due next week.  

Can we reschedule our coffee date? Something came up.  

The event starts at 2 PM; don’t forget to bring your ID!  

Happy birthday! Hope your day is filled with joy and laughter.  

I’ll send you the files we discussed by the end of the day.  

Just wanted to remind you about the soccer game this Saturday!  

Your feedback is important to us. Please take a moment to complete our survey.  

I finished the book you lent me. Let’s discuss it soon!  

Your appointment has been confirmed for next Tuesday at noon.  

Thanks for the reminder about the deadline!  

I’ll be at the gym around 5 PM if you want to join.  

Your payment has been received. Thank you!  

Looking forward to the potluck next week. What are you bringing?  

I’ll send you the updated schedule by the end of the day.  

How was your weekend? Did you get to relax?  

The deadline for submission is next Friday.  

I’ve got your back if you need help with that project.

The team is excited about the upcoming project launch!
